title: Amid Venezuela tumult, U.S. wants Latin American countries to lead in finding a solution
content: The Biden administration has preferred to let leaders of Colombia, Brazil and Mexico take the lead pressuring the Maduro government, but a more active U.S. role may be inevitable.
summary: The Biden administration has preferred to let leaders of Colombia, Brazil and Mexico take the lead pressuring the Maduro government, but a more active U.S. role may be inevitable.

title: Nearly 100 killed in Israeli strike on school, Gaza officials say
content: The Israel Defense Forces said Hamas fighters had been operating in the Gaza City school. Eleven children and six women were among those killed, a Gaza official said.
summary: The Israel Defense Forces said Hamas fighters had been operating in the Gaza City school. Eleven children and six women were among those killed, a Gaza official said.

title: Cartel boss ‘El Mayo’: I was detained before meeting with politician
content: The Sinaloa cartel chief said El Chapo Guzman’s son invited him to a meeting with Sinaloa’s governor, but he was ambushed and then flown to the United States.
summary: The Sinaloa cartel chief said El Chapo Guzman’s son invited him to a meeting with Sinaloa’s governor, but he was ambushed and then flown to the United States.

title: The 2024 Paris Olympics, in comics
content: We asked our favorite cartoonists to watch and live illustrate the 2024 Paris Summer Games.
summary: We asked our favorite cartoonists to watch and live illustrate the 2024 Paris Summer Games.

title: Ukraine appears to expand Russia incursion, in morale boost for Kyiv
content: Ukrainian forces have continued to push deeper into Russia, further signaling this operation wasn’t a short raid but rather a potential occupation.
summary: Ukrainian forces have continued to push deeper into Russia, further signaling this operation wasn’t a short raid but rather a potential occupation.

title: Plane carrying 62 people crashes in Brazil with no survivors, official says
content: The governor of São Paulo state said he had been informed there were no survivors on Voepass Flight 2283 from Cascavel to São Paulo.
summary: The governor of São Paulo state said he had been informed there were no survivors on Voepass Flight 2283 from Cascavel to São Paulo.

title: China courts developing nations in its push to build a new world order
content: Beijing is forging ties in the “Global South” not just with money but also by lending political support based on antipathy toward the American-led order.
summary: Beijing is forging ties in the “Global South” not just with money but also by lending political support based on antipathy toward the American-led order.

title: U.S. says cartel infighting led to capture of ‘El Mayo’ and El Chapo’s son
content: The U.S. ambassador’s account is the first official explanation of the mysterious flight that carried two Sinaloa cartel leaders to the United States last month.
summary: The U.S. ambassador’s account is the first official explanation of the mysterious flight that carried two Sinaloa cartel leaders to the United States last month.

title: U.S. will fund Israeli unit accused of gross human rights abuses
content: The determination ends a lengthy investigation of the Netzah Yehuda battalion, an ultra-Orthodox Israeli unit implicated in the death of a Palestinian American.
summary: The determination ends a lengthy investigation of the Netzah Yehuda battalion, an ultra-Orthodox Israeli unit implicated in the death of a Palestinian American.

title: U.S. restarts offensive weapons sales to Saudi Arabia after lengthy ban
content: The sale to Saudi Arabia of certain U.S. weapons was frozen in 2021 to signal the Biden administration’s disapproval of the Saudi war with Yemen’s Houthis.
summary: The sale to Saudi Arabia of certain U.S. weapons was frozen in 2021 to signal the Biden administration’s disapproval of the Saudi war with Yemen’s Houthis.

title: Moscow rushes to send troops as Ukrainian attack on Kursk tests Kremlin
content: The incursion by Ukrainian forces into western Russia posed the biggest challenge for President Vladimir Putin since the 2023 uprising of Wagner mercenaries.
summary: The incursion by Ukrainian forces into western Russia posed the biggest challenge for President Vladimir Putin since the 2023 uprising of Wagner mercenaries.

title: Catalan leader Puigdemont in Belgium after fleeing Spain, he says
content: An official with Carles Puigdemont’s separatist party said he was returning to Belgium, where he has been based since staging a 2017 referendum for Catalan independence.
summary: An official with Carles Puigdemont’s separatist party said he was returning to Belgium, where he has been based since staging a 2017 referendum for Catalan independence.

title: Catalan leader Puigdemont reemerges in Spain, then vanishes, evading arrest
content: Carles Puigdemont had been in self-imposed exile since a bid for Catalan independence in 2017. His return is a challenge to Spanish authorities.
summary: Carles Puigdemont had been in self-imposed exile since a bid for Catalan independence in 2017. His return is a challenge to Spanish authorities.

title: Vietnam accelerates island building to challenge China’s maritime claims
content: As tensions mount in the South China Sea, Vietnam is dredging and filling in land, fortifying barriers and erecting new structures to create hundreds of acres.
summary: As tensions mount in the South China Sea, Vietnam is dredging and filling in land, fortifying barriers and erecting new structures to create hundreds of acres.

title: South Korea recycles 98% of its food waste. What can it teach the world?
content: Almost all leftovers from homes and restaurants are turned into compost, animal feed and even energy. But its model isn’t easy to replicate.
summary: Almost all leftovers from homes and restaurants are turned into compost, animal feed and even energy. But its model isn’t easy to replicate.

title: Britain’s riots put spotlight on far-right misinformation
content: Social media posts — including a few by X owner Elon Musk — have played a crucial role in accelerating rage and misinformation.
summary: Social media posts — including a few by X owner Elon Musk — have played a crucial role in accelerating rage and misinformation.

title: U.S., Egypt, Qatar urge Israel, Hamas to restart Gaza cease-fire talks
content: Israel said it would send a delegation to the resumed negotiations, to be held in Cairo or Doha, Qatar. Hamas gave no immediate response.
summary: Israel said it would send a delegation to the resumed negotiations, to be held in Cairo or Doha, Qatar. Hamas gave no immediate response.

title: Ukraine, powered by Western arms, stuns Russia in cross-border assault
content: A surprise Ukrainian attack into Russia’s Kursk region appeared to use Western-donated fighting vehicles. The U.S. offered no objections to the operation.
summary: A surprise Ukrainian attack into Russia’s Kursk region appeared to use Western-donated fighting vehicles. The U.S. offered no objections to the operation.
